smpp_client:start("4115",{127,0,0,1},4040).
smpp_client:bind("4115").

% unbind
smpp_client:send("4115", "00 00 00 10 00 00 00 06 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01").

% submit_sm
smpp_client:send("4115", "00 00 00 44 00 00 00 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 05 00 34 31 30 33 37 00 00 00 30 37 39 34 36 35 30 31 31 35 00 00 00 00 00 00 11 00 00 00 14 74 65 73 74 20 73 77 69 73 73 63 6F 6D 20 28 53 4D 50 50 29").

% enquire_link
smpp_client:send("4115", "00 00 00 10 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01").

smpp_client:stop("4115").

% deliver_sm
smpp_server:send(4115, "00 00 00 39 00 00 00 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 18 64 66 6B 6C 62 76 73 64 66 6A 6B 6C 62 76 6B 6C 66 76 66 64 76 66 76 64").

% deliver_sm_resp
smpp_client:send("4115", "00 00 00 11 80 00 00 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00").
